In order to use our products and/or services in order to fully use our products and/or services.In accordance with the provisions of this privacy protection policy and disclose your personal information, we know the importance of personal information to you, and we will do our best to protect your personal information security and reliable.

text: 3. How do we use cookies and similar technologies
(1) Cookie
In order to ensure the normal operation of fast shadow and get a easier access experience for you, we will store small data files named Cookie on your mobile devices.
Cookie usually contains identifiers, site names, and some numbers and characters.

For example, with the help of cookies, websites and clients can store data such as registered accounts, mailboxes, passwords (encryption) and preferences. Cookie can also help us count the traffic information, analyze the effectiveness of page design and advertising.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: With Cookie, websites and clients can store data such as registered accounts, mailboxes, passwords and preferences.

text: We will not use Cookie for any purpose outside the purpose of this policy.
label: Important
rewrite: We will not use Cookie for any purpose outside the purpose of this policy.

text: You can manage or delete according to your preferences, cookies.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can manage or delete Cookie according to your preferences.

text: You can remove all the Cookie saved on the mobile device, but if you do this, you need to change the user settings in person every time you use fast shadows.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can clear all Cookie saved on the mobile device.

text: You can also choose to choose not to be tracked by deleting cookie and restoring (clear) mobile terminal settings (content and data).
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can also choose not to be tracked by deleting cookie and restoring mobile terminal settings.

text: (2) Network beaches and pixel labels
In addition to Cookie, we may also use other similar technologies such as websites and pixel labels.

For example, the email we send to you may contain a link to our click URL. If you click the link, we will track this click to help us understand your preference for products or services and improve customer service.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: If you click our URL, we will track this click.

text: The website's beacon is usually a transparent image embedded in the website or email. With the pixel label in the email, we can know whether the email is opened to help us determine the number of emails sending emails to users or not to be directed to the user or not to be directed to users.Users send emails.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: With the pixel labels in emails, we can know whether the email has been opened.

text: If you don't want your activities to be tracked in this way, you can withdraw from our signal list at any time.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If you don't want your activities to be tracked, you can withdraw from our letter at any time.

text: 5. How do we protect and save your personal information
(1) Technical protection:
